name: S&T Bancorp, Inc.
description: S&T Bancorp, Inc. is a financial services holding company based in Indiana, Pennsylvania. Established in 1902, S&T Bancorp operates through its primary subsidiary, S&T Bank, which provides a wide array of banking services to individuals, businesses, and government entities. The company is committed to delivering personalized banking solutions and financial services, including commercial and retail banking, mortgage banking, and wealth management. S&T Bank offers a variety of deposit accounts, loans, and investment products designed to meet the diverse needs of its customers. With a strong emphasis on community involvement, S&T Bancorp actively participates in local initiatives and charitable activities, reinforcing its dedication to enhancing the quality of life in the regions it serves. The company has expanded its footprint over the years, acquiring several banks and branches to enhance its service offerings and customer reach. S&T Bancorp continues to invest in technology and digital banking solutions, ensuring a seamless banking experience for its customers in a rapidly evolving financial landscape.

seo.meta_title: S&T Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore S&T Bancorp, Inc., a leading provider of community banking and financial services. Discover our commitment to personalized banking solutions and community involvement.

faq.question: What services does S&T Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: S&T Bancorp offers a wide range of services including personal banking, business banking, and wealth management.

faq.question: Where is S&T Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: S&T Bancorp is headquartered in Indiana, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of S&T Bancorp?
faq.answer: Christopher S. McCombie is the CEO of S&T Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Does S&T Bancorp offer online banking?
faq.answer: Yes, S&T Bancorp offers online banking and digital banking solutions for its customers.
